alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 11:01PM EST until February 20 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...Until late Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 31.0 feet, Major flooding occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 PM EST Friday the stage was 29.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:15 PM EST Friday was 29.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 30.2 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 30.2 feet on 02/07/2004. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. The next statement will be issued by 12 pm est Saturday.
